divs: Sighting DetailsThis happened 8 years ago. My family and I were driving to Florida. It was approximately 5-5:30am. My kids were sleeping in the backseat, my wife was awake in the front seat. I had stopped just pass an overpass to relieve myself as there was hardly any traffic that early. It was a Saturday morning. As I was standing behind the car, I noticed this very bright light in the sky. It was approximately as high as an airliner and did look like a star. However, I am very honest when I say this. As I stood there, this light flew down to about 50ft above me. It made no sound. I don't remember there being any kind of light on the ground from this. I don't know why, but I stood there looking at it. Just as quickly as it flew down above me, it shot back up and out of sight. I got back into the car and left. That's what I don't understand about myself. I drove to Cincinnati and never mentioned this to my wife until we stopped for gas. I explained to her what I saw. She didn't really believe me. I wasn't really that upset. I have never talked about it with anyone other than my wife. A year ago, I read someone had the same type of encounter. I can't say what it was. This is the only time I've ever seen a UFO.
